Module Reference¶

class skccm.skccm.CCM(weights='exp', score_metric='corrcoef', verbose=False)¶

Convergent cross mapping for two embedded time series

fit(X1_train, X2_train)¶

Fit the training data for ccm. Amount of near neighbors is set to be embedding dimension plus one. Creates seperate near neighbor regressors for X1 and X2 independently. Also Calculates the distances to each sample.

X1 : embedded time series of shape (num_samps,embed_dim) X2 : embedded time series of shape (num_samps,embed_dim)

predict(X1_test, X2_test, lib_lengths)¶

Make a prediction

X1_test : test set X2_test : test set lib_lengths : list of library lengths to test

score(how='corrcoef')¶

Evalulate the predictions. Calculates the skill down each column and averages them together to get the total skill.

how
: how to score the predictions
-‘score’ -‘corrcoef’
